casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Russell Antoine COOPER. No. 490P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. Anthony M. Brannon, Raleigh, for Cooper. C. Colon Wlloughby, Jr., District Attorney.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of October 2007 by State of NC for a Temporary Stay:

"Motion for Stay Dissolved by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of August 2008."
